name: tm85
effect: Teaches Dream Eater to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Dream Eater to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.
